message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 3-9-3, translated into en
data: Data inputs to the estimate include (a) data on Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene services and practices, and (b) cause-of-death data, of which the preferred data source is death registration systems with complete coverage and medical certification of cause of death. Other possible data sources include household surveys with verbal autopsy, sample or sentinel registration systems, special studies and surveillance systems.
